website_summaries.verdict: Arrives professionally packaged and instantly adds to your kitchen both in terms of function and design.
pros: Noted for its overall design that includes touches of Pakka wood and steel
Exceeds several customers' expectations in terms of its price and overall use
An easy upgrade to any kitchen
cons: Little information is provided in terms of how long this knife will last, however current reviews shouldn't deter you from testing it out

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Handle is extremely comfortable. After slicing or chopping, it can be used as a food mover; transferring from board to pan. The price was excellent for such a great blade.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmin Savin

customer_reviews.title: Quality price is the best !
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaver. It's extremely sharp. With proper holding of the food, a sharp blade is safer to use than a dull one. After slicing or chopping, it can be used as a food mover; transferring from board to pan. The price was excellent for such a great blade. As stated by other reviews, the packaging was extraordinary. I'll be purchasing from this company again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Eugen Ursu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that it is above what I have expected when I saw it and tried it in my hand. It's a great quality cooking knife. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful made !!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for such a low price. Packaging is superb. Comes in a really really fancy box. Be careful the knife is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Ana T

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much, for a $17.00 knife. The knife is well made. All metal forged one piece handle. With nice wooden inserts riveted on the handle. So far so good. Knife is very sharp. Time and use will tell if it will hold its edge. The Chinese have been using these knives forever. Very practical cooking utensil.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Maclean

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Well balanced for easy use. Use with care--very sharp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: atticmom

customer_reviews.title: best value
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a moderately heavy cleaver for a while. Finally decided on this knife. Best decision I could have made. Its super sharp, balanced and is a joy to use. Super fast shipping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: A Best Buy Value
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase & a replacement for my old cleaver - I utilize it daily & hang it from a kitchen hook - I would suggest separate storage to save the blade - wall hook , hanging hook or magnetic wall strip
customer_reviews.author: REGINA BAKER

customer_reviews.title: It was a great decision to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is after unboxing. If you love grilling this knife is a must have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: VLAD BOGDAN

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and I already know this knife and I are going to be friends for a long time. I've been looking for a cleaver that was good quality but not super expensive. Got more than I expected, beautiful, good heft and I can control the chop.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrie

customer_reviews.title: The best knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knife compared price and quality.Beautiful knife and amazing sharp.I am happy I bought it and will add it to my collection.I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: cristian ciortea

customer_reviews.title: 7 inch chopper knife
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this product yet but am planning on it this weekend.The 7" chopper knife came in as expected with know flaw's at all was delivered on time. Love the quality and design would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert brabham

customer_reviews.title: Great for price so far
customer_reviews.text: For price verry good feels substantial and sharp not sure how long will hold edge have only used couple times
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G. Addington

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had the knife for over one year and it's still working as new.
customer_reviews.author: Yinjig

customer_reviews.title: My kitchen king
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and very hard i can chop the neck bones easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for the price this works perfectly, sharp right out of the box. I use this a lot more then I thought I would. I definitely would recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Arcadio Avellanet

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This cleaver did not perform as indicated. The blade bent easily and I have asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ju Ju

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blade
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed! Sharp sturdy durable! And at a low price ! Now time to BBQ!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and sharp knife with a lot of weight to it
customer_reviews.author: dakota stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, great kitchen help!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is really nice, i love how this knife completes with my hand, very well built and very sharp! Overall great product! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Busecan

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed about this product! The knife is very well build, its very sharp and it’s steel is super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Muresan

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my adult son who is using it for cooking Chinese meals, primarily chopping vegetables. He is very pleased with it's function and that it seems to be of high quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Janet U. Fogg

customer_reviews.title: shape and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a not heavy , but it can cut bones so easy.
customer_reviews.author: WaI Au

customer_reviews.title: It kicks butt
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple of times and it's been awesome. Comfortable and my hand didnt get tired.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right weight. Not too heavy. Super sharp. Love my chopper.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest knife I've ever taken out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as Satan's teeth, right out of the box. Excellent multi-purpose clever for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected! Durable and and sharp! I used to cut meat for tacos and did the job as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaver we've owned.
customer_reviews.text: We have several high quality expensive knives. German ones we never use any more. Japanese are on another level. Best in the world. This restaurant quality Cleaver is awesome, especially for cutting easily thru bones. I use my Japanese knee for vegetables, meat, & fruits. The German crap is useless.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Confused by writers
customer_reviews.text: Two reviews are word for word the same; and two reviewers with name cristian (one after the other??) REALLY?
customer_reviews.author: hikeryaker

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Easily get broken after 3 months use. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Peirong Lin

product_meta.title: Cleaver Knife Premium Heavy Duty Chopper Butcher Knife Stainless Steel 7 Inches Meat Knife for Home Kitchen and Restaurant, Professional Chinese Knife
product_meta.description:
Thank you for trusting ProCookHouse - we are an enthusiastic team of young people passionate about cooking.


We FOCUS on QUALITY and never make any rebates to it. With our kitchen gear, you’ll take your hobby to the next level!


Made of premium stainless steel with an ergonomical and lightweight Pakkawood handle, this meat cleaver is easy and fun to use every day.


You can say Goodbye to...


• Bad angled blades
• Handle snapping
• Bad cutting blades
• Flimsy and light knives

…and say Hello to


• Anti-slip handle design
• Durable materials
• No dragging, no snagging
• Real chef’s knife at half the price 
• Designed in USA with 24hours US Based Customer Service

We pay attention to DETAILS because cooking is all about details which make the difference


We made our products PRACTICAL, because time is priceless…you don’t want to waste it!


• Easy to store in its box, if not used
• Take out and put back in no time
• Always gets you out of trouble when searching for a gift

WE CARE…


It’s worth a try, isn’t it?
feature_bullets: A MUST HAVE : Heavy duty chinese cleaver, 100% stainless steel, ergonomical Pakkawood handle, razor sharp blade, a chopper knife that you are not allowed not to have in your kitchen; undecided between many knives? That's an easy choice - ProcookHouse it the one for you

SO MANY USES - 7 Inch cleaver knife cuts easily through large pieces of food and is perfect for bone cutting or chopping; need perfectly sliced vegetables? No problem, youre reliable friend, the chinese vegetable cleaver is here to help

SCALPEL SHARP BLADE - Don't you just hate when your knife simply does not cut things ? No more worries about that, now you can have German precision cuts with no hassle; Either you need a meat cutting knife, a bone cutting knife or a chinese cleaver knife, the cuts will be as precise and easy as you imagined

FOR PROFESSIONAL CHEFS OR BEGINNERS - Chef or amateur cook, anyone needs a good butchers knife; and if it can also be used as a chinese kitchen knife, a chinese knife cleaver or a cleaver butcher knife, that's just awesome! Don't forget the great package that makes an amazing gift for family and friends

PRACTICAL AND SAFE - Even if it's dishwasher safe, hand washing is recommended for good maintenence of the exceptional blade; However, if any problems occur, contact our amazing Customer Service and we'll sove your problem in no time; We care about you and your knives, no matter if they are butcher knives, meat cleavers, knives for meat, asian chopper or else
